title: AI Feedback-Based Social Studies Curriculum for Enhancing Collaborative Learning Effectiveness in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Fundamental Social Studies Concepts, Digital Device Utilization Skills, and Collaborative Learning Experience
context.additional_context: LMS integration with AI analytics tools, real-time feedback based on individual learning patterns, and group collaboration assignments

learning_goals: Learners can improve their contribution rate in group collaboration processes by over 80% using AI analysis feedback
Learners can establish collaboration strategies based on learning analytics data to enhance task completion rates by 30%
Learners can propose three or more effective communication strategies in collaborative conflict situations through real-time AI feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
